translations: v．结巴，口吃：说话时重复或延长某些音节，通常是因为紧张、害羞或其他原因导致的语言障碍。
· He stutters when he is nervous.

sentences.sentence: He stutters out, "your neighbor's cousin actually works with my uncle, and she invited us to a picnic, and so we just happened to be in the area."
sentences.translation: 他结结巴巴地说：“你邻居的表姐实际上是和我叔叔一起工作，然后她邀请我们去野餐，所以我们正好碰巧在这个地区。”

sentences.sentence: "I... I... I don't know," he stutters.
sentences.translation: “我……我……我不知道，”他结结巴巴地说。

sentences.sentence: No one ever mumbles, stutters, or says "um..."
sentences.translation: 没有人会咕哝，结结巴巴说话，或说“um...”
